---
agent: Instructions Generator
---
Take the information below and generate an [NAME].instructions.md file for it in the /.github/instructions directory. Generate an appropriate name for the [NAME] placeholder based on the generated content. Make sure the instructions are consie and not too long.
If no information is provieded below, prompt the user to give the necessary details about the layer of architechture or coding standards to document.
The .md file should have frontmatter with a description property that informs copilot of when to use this set of instructions.
